p: The Coronavirus known as SARS-CoV-2 and 2019-nCoV emerged in the city of Wuhan, China in December 2019. Soon after it started spreading quickly and reached other cities in China, Japan, and South Korea. As this paper goes to press there are more than 190 countries affected, and according to the World Health Organization it has reached pandemic stage. The previous epidemics of Coronavirus were Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus (SARS-CoV) in 2002 and the Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Virus (MERS-CoV) in 2012.
